title: SSO Service Outage
description: The company's Single Sign-On (SSO) provider is having an outage, preventing all users from logging into cloud applications. An analyst must manage the incident.

tasks.description: Acknowledge multiple user reports of being unable to log in.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst quickly recognizes the issue is widespread.

tasks.description: Check the status page of the SSO provider to confirm they are reporting a major outage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the root cause is an external vendor outage.

tasks.description: Post a notification on the company's internal status page, informing employees of the issue and that the team is monitoring the vendor for updates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst effectively communicates the situation to the entire company.
